title: Discovery of life-extension pathway in worms demonstrates new way to study aging

title_detail.value: Discovery of life-extension pathway in worms demonstrates new way to study aging

summary: An enzyme-blocking molecule can extend the lifespan of Caenorhabditis elegans roundworms by as much as 45 percent, largely by modulating a cannabinoid biological pathway, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: An enzyme-blocking molecule can extend the lifespan of Caenorhabditis elegans roundworms by as much as 45 percent, largely by modulating a cannabinoid biological pathway, according to a new study.
